name: Casey's General Stores
short_description: Casey's General Stores, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates convenience stores under the Casey's and Casey’s General Store names.
long_description: Casey's General Stores, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates convenience stores under the Casey's and Casey’s General Store names. The company’s stores offer a selection of food, including freshly prepared foods, such as pizza, donuts, and sandwiches; beverages, tobacco, and nicotine products; health and beauty aids; automotive products; and other nonfood items. Its stores also provide fuel for sale on a self-service basis. In addition, the company operates two stores under the Tobacco City name primarily selling tobacco and nicotine products; two liquor stores; and one grocery store. As of April 30, 2019, it operated approximately 2,146 convenience stores in 16 states in the Midwest. Casey's General Stores, Inc. was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Ankeny, Iowa.
